chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is having the following problem:

For half a day, it was stuck at 1% and would shut down every two minutes, and impossible to charge. It showed that maybe the battery wasn't original even though I hadn't changed it.

Then it completely shut off and wouldn't turn back on; all that appeared was the Apple logo.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

I will come back to you as part of the Anaïs Marchal client file.

According to our quality charter, you have 3 working days to take charge of the request and proceed with the shipment.

After this period, we will refund the customer at your expense.

However, I find that the repair or replacement time has passed, so you will have to find a solution within 24 hours.

Please send us an active tracking link.

Thanks for the understanding.

Sincerely,

Jacques-Elie from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
